statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM feedback_sentiment_analysis WHERE identified_issue = 'product_quality';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_sentiment_analysis WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT identified_issue, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM feedback_sentiment_analysis GROUP BY identified_issue;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score, MIN(sentiment_score) AS min_score FROM feedback_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT * FROM feedback_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, identified_issue FROM feedback_sentiment_analysis WHERE identified_issue IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_sentiment_analysis WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' AND sentiment_score >= 0.7 LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score, identified_issue FROM feedback_sentiment_analysis GROUP BY identified_issue HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 3
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM feedback_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, feedback_id, analysis_date FROM feedback_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_analysis
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT analysis_date, suggested_improvements FROM feedback_analysis WHERE analysis_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, suggested_improvements FROM customer_feedback JOIN feedback_analysis ON customer_feedback.feedback_id = feedback_analysis.feedback_id
SELECT * FROM feedback_sentiments;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, sentiment_score FROM feedback_sentiments ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, area_description FROM improvement_areas WHERE action_plan IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM feedback_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_sentiments WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_category FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT area_description FROM improvement_areas ORDER BY improvement_id DESC;

SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_sentiments JOIN customer_feedback ON feedback_sentiments.customer_id = customer_feedback.customer_id WHERE customer_feedback.feedback_category = 'Service';
SELECT * FROM feedback_sentiments;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM product_details WHERE product_price < 100 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM product_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_sentiments WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, product_name FROM customer_details INNER JOIN product_details ON customer_details.customer_id = product_details.product_id;

SELECT customer_name, product_category, product_price FROM customer_details, product_details, product_feedback WHERE customer_details.customer_id = product_feedback.feedback_id AND product_details.product_id = product_feedback.product_id;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_sentiments;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT area_name, description FROM improvement_areas WHERE area_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email DESC
SELECT review_id, product_id, rating FROM product_reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5
SELECT customer_id, service_rating, service_comment FROM service_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT area_id, area_name, description FROM improvement_areas
